channel.title: RS Zombies, as realistic as i can make it
channel.description:
Well, i thought it will be cool, to make zombies on rs, including Perks, Doors and the random box
Progress: -Perks (0%), need to make perk models, but the problem is i suck at making models haha. -Doors (25%) -Rounds (40%) -Random box (0%) -Shops (10%) -Maps (5%)
probally forgot alot :D
Goal: good working maps, without any glitches, working perks, working random box, working doors, mabey even power, traps, teleport and pack-a-punch?
The only problem is the models i need, but if i cant make OK looking perks and random box, i have to choose already existing objects.
Well, please vote if i should continue making this or not.

item.title: RS Zombies, as realistic as i can make it
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Write it as simple as simple first. Add like 50 levels. Make it so when you advance to a new level it says it in the chatbox like “Wave 3”. Then progress on from that instead of making all of these models then thinking ‘how the fuck do i make this work’ and end up sitting there like a moron. I’m not saying that this is what will happen, I’m saying it’s safer to go my way, make the game first, it doesn’t have to be great, just make it. Then progress from that.

Read full topic
